<p><em>Release in-progress: <a href="https://discuss.layer5.io/t/meshery-v0-9-roadmap/6296">v0.9.0</a> <a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/milestone/6">GitHub Milestone</a></em></p>
<h3><a name="p-11761-topics-4" class="anchor" href="#p-11761-topics-4"></a>Topics:</h3>
<ul>
<li>[Parthiv Saikia] [Model generation errors ]</li>
<li>[Himani Sahu] [<a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/pull/16659">Add a new Kanvas Tutorial</a> <a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/pull/16659">#16659</a>]</li>
<li>[Suhani &amp; Raunak] ESLint CI Fix
<ul>
<li>PR: <a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/pull/16661">#16661</a> | Issue: <a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/issues/16657">#16657</a></li>
<li>Problem: ESLint CI was failing on fork-based PRs because it tried to auto-fix and commit code.</li>
<li>Solution: Moved auto-fixing to local pre-commit hooks; CI now runs in check-only mode.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>[Suhani] PR Review
<ul>
<li>Add auto- labeler config <a href="https://github.com/meshery-extensions/meshery-linkerd/pull/627">#627</a></li>
<li>Make workflow permissions default to read explicitly <a href="https://github.com/meshery-extensions/meshery-linkerd/pull/631">#631</a></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>[Kaivalaya Dua]</li>
<li>Discuss <a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/issues/16669">Meshery issues #16669</a> backstory.</li>
<li>PR Review <a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/pull/16671">#16671</a></li>
<li>[Shrikant Shingare] Discus <a href="https://github.com/meshery/meshery/issues/10509">Meshery issue</a>   Notification Center.</li>
<li>[Help Wanted] Update to Golang 1.25: there are ~25 open issues <a href="https://github.com/meshery-extensions/meshery-linkerd/issues/634">like this one</a> in <a href="https://github.com/meshery-extensions">Meshery Extensions · GitHub</a> and <a href="https://github.com/meshery">https://github.com/meshery</a></li>
<li>[Aabid Sofi]
<ul>
<li>Optimize meshsync resource endpoints</li>

</ul>
</li>
